results.title: Care and use of hand tools. Pt. III: chisels
results.creator_credit: Plomb Tool Co and Signal Corps Production

results.title: Canterbury: home of handweaving
results.brief_description: Hand weaving loom and spinning wheel manufacture in a Canterbury workshop. Shows the care and skill used in the production of these machines, each the work of one craftsman. At the Cathedral Weaving Centre, weavers can buy materials and learn the art of making fine hand-woven.
results.description: Hand weaving loom and spinning wheel manufacture in a Canterbury workshop. Shows the care and skill used in the production of these machines, each the work of one craftsman. At the Cathedral Weaving Centre, weavers can buy materials and learn the art of making fine hand-woven.
description_for_label: Hand weaving loom and spinning wheel manufacture in a Canterbury workshop. Shows the care and skill used in the production of these machines, each the work of one craftsman. results.title: BYO: sprung
results.creator_credit: Eric Mival and Queensland.Dept. of Education. Production Services Branch
results.brief_description: One in a series of films following BYO, this episode revolves around the attitudes of the parents whose teenage son comes home drunk. A discussion starter for teenagers. Suitable for secondary school level.

results.title: By hook or by crook
results.creator_credit: Russell Sefton and Christian Television Association of Victoria
results.brief_description: A film about early Christian Art examining the aesthetics and in particular, that of the catacombs of Rome. Pays special attention to the culltural-historical context from which it evolved. Presented by Barry Marshall.
